title: Fried Chicken
itunes:title: Fried Chicken
description:
In this episode, Bobby and Sophie break down Fried Chicken. First, Bobby shows Sophie his controversial technique for making friend chicken not only crispy, but perfectly cooked. Then they head to the table and discuss all things Fried Chicken: from old Beat Bobby Flay stories, to the extremes that new fried chicken sandwiches are going to with their spice levels.

For more information on "Always Hungry" follow the hosts on their instagram pages:

Bobby Flay Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bobbyflay

Sophie Flay Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/abc7sophie

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
